moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.effect: Has a chance (20%) of leaving the target confused.

moves.name: X Defense All
moves.effect: Raises the Defense of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: To the Top!
moves.effect: Applies the Move Gauge Acceleration effect to the allied field of play. Raises the critical-hit rate of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank.

syncMove.name: Triumphant Hydro Cannon
syncMove.description: Become Mega Blastoise until the end of battle. The more the user’s Defense is raised, the greater the power of this move.

passives.name: Force Field 4
passives.description: Has a chance (50%) of raising the Sp. Def of all allied sync pairs by one stat rank when the user’s Pokémon uses a move.

passives.name: Team Shout 9
passives.description: Raises the Attack or Sp. Atk—or both—of all allied sync pairs by one stat rank when the user is hit by an attack move.

passives.name: Safety Net
passives.description: Applies the Enduring effect to all allied sync pairs the first time the user’s sync move is used each battle.

grid.bonus: Water Pulse:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Water Pulse:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
X Defense All:MP Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Hydro Cannon:Move Gauge Refresh 4- Has a chance (50%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Hydro Cannon:Propulsion 2- Has a chance (30%) of reducing the user’s sync move countdown by one when the user’s move is successful.
To the Top!:Move Gauge Refresh 9- Charges the user’s move gauge by one when its move is successful.
To the Top!:MP Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
To the Top!:Pep Rally 1- Raises the Speed of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank when the user’s move is successful.
Endurance- When the user enters battle with full HP, applies the Enduring effect to it.
Racing Rain 2- Quickly charges the move gauge when the weather is rainy.
Raging Rain 3- Powers up the user’s moves when the weather is rainy.
Quick Cure- Removes the confused, flinching, and trapped conditions from the user the first time they are inflicted each battle.
Natural Remedy- Removes all status conditions from the user the first time it is inflicted by any status condition each battle.
Adrenaline 1- Reduces the sync move countdown by 1 the first time the user’s sync move is used each battle.
Refreshing Rain 1- Restores the user’s HP whenever its Pokémon takes an action while the weather is rainy.
Smart Cookie- The more the user’s Sp. Def is raised, the more it powers up the user’s moves.
Wise Entry 2- Raises the user’s Sp. Def by 2 stat ranks when it enters a battle.
Party Crashers- Applies the Critical Hit Next effect to all allied sync pairs the first time the user enters a battle each battle.
Team Fist Bump 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring the HP of all allied sync pairs when the user’s attack move is successful.
Team Triage Tank 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring the HP of all allied sync pairs when the user is hit by an attack move.
